text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Friday’s episode, AK Prabhakar, head of research at IDBI Capital and Kiran Jadhav, chief managing director at Kiran Jadhav & Associates shared their views on DLF, ONGC, Reliance Capital, Sundaram Fasteners, Tata Motors-DVR and many more.
title: Buy, Sell Or Hold DLF, ONGC, Reliance Capital, Tata Motors? #AskBQ
